BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PIST_ACR_GRP_B_DTL (STR_ACR_PERIOD,NUM_HOSP_ID,STR_EMP_OFF_ATTRI_CODE,STR_ESTB_SEC_ID,STR_SER_GRP_ATTRI_CODE,STR_EMP_NO,NUM_SL_NO,NUM_STATUS,NUM_DESIG_ID,NUM_DEPT_ID,STR_SUB_CADRE_SP,STR_NON_TEACHING,STR_SPECIALITY,STR_GDMO,STR_PAY_SCALE_CATEGORY,STR_PAY_SCALE_TYPE,STR_PAY_BAND,STR_PAY_CODE,NUM_GRADE_PAY,NUM_CUR_BASIC_PAY, DT_CONT_APP_DATE, STR_WORK_DEPT_AND_SINCE, DT_PROP_RETURN_DATE,STR_LEAVE,STR_TRAINING, STR_AFD_OTH_REASON, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE PIST_ACR_GRP_B_DTL A SET A.NUM_STATUS=?,A.STR_DUTIES_DESC=?,A.STR_WORK_DONE_RESUME=?,A.STR_ACADEMIC_ACHIEVEMENT=?,A.STR_SHORTFALL=?,A.STR_OPD_WORK=?,A.STR_INDOOR_WORK=?,A.STR_OT_WORK=?,A.STR_DOMICILIARY_VISIT=?,A.STR_LAB_WORK=?, A.STR_OTHER_WORK=?,A.STR_ADMINISTRATIVE_WORK=?,A.STR_REP_UPON_OFF_EMP_NO=?,A.NUM_REP_UPON_OFF_DESIG_ID=?,A.STR_REP_UPON_OFF_STATION=?,A.DT_REP_UPON_OFF_DATE=?,A.GNUM_ISVALID=?,A.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,A.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=? WHERE A.STR_ACR_PERIOD=? and A.STR_EMP_OFF_ATTRI_CODE=? and A.STR_ESTB_SEC_ID=? and A.STR_EMP_NO=? and A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE PIST_ACR_GRP_B_DTL A SET A.NUM_STATUS=?,A.STR_REPORTING_OFF_REMARKS=?,A.STR_OUTPUT_QUALITY=?,A.STR_KNOWLEDGE_OF_WORK=?,A.STR_WORK_ATTITUDE=?,A.STR_DECISION_ABILITY=?,A.STR_INITIATIVE=?,A.STR_INSPIRE_ABILITY=?,A.STR_COMM_SKILLS=?,A.STR_INTERPER_RELATION=?,A.STR_PUBLIC_RELATION=?,A.STR_ATT_TOWARD_SC_ST=?,A.STR_PLANNING_ABILITY=?,A.STR_PROPER_ASSIGN_TASK=?,A.STR_IDENTIFY_PERSONNEL=?,A.STR_PERFORM_GUIDANCE=?,A.STR_PERFORM_REVIEW=?,A.STR_COORDINATION_ABILITY=?,A.STR_PERSONNEL_ADMIN=?,A.STR_FINANCIAL_ADMIN=?,A.STR_SOCIAL_SERVICES=?,A.STR_PLANNING=?,A.STR_ANY_OTHER_FIELD=?,A.STR_TRAINING_RECOMMEND=?,A.STR_STATE_OF_HEALTH=?,A.STR_INTEGRITY=?,A.STR_GEN_ASSESSMENT=?,A.STR_REP_OFF_GRADING=?, A.STR_REP_OFF_EMP_NO=?, NUM_REP_OFF_DESIG_ID=?, A.STR_REP_OFF_STATION=?, A.DT_REP_OFF_DATE=?,A.GNUM_ISVALID=?,A.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,A.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=? WHERE A.STR_ACR_PERIOD=? and A.STR_EMP_OFF_ATTRI_CODE=? and A.STR_ESTB_SEC_ID=? and A.STR_EMP_NO=? and A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE PIST_ACR_GRP_B_DTL A SET A.NUM_STATUS=?,A.STR_LEN_OF_SERVICE=?,A.STR_REV_OFF_AGREEMENT=?,A.STR_REV_OFF_REMARKS=?,A.STR_REV_OFF_GRADING=?,A.STR_REV_OFF_EMP_NO=?,A.NUM_REV_OFF_DESIG_ID=?,A.STR_REV_OFF_IS_MED_PER=?,A.DT_REV_OFF_DATE=?, A.STR_REV_OFF_STATION=? ,A.GNUM_ISVALID=?,A.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,A.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=? WHERE A.STR_ACR_PERIOD=? and A.STR_EMP_OFF_ATTRI_CODE=? and A.STR_ESTB_SEC_ID=? and A.STR_EMP_NO=? and A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE PIST_ACR_GRP_B_DTL A SET A.NUM_STATUS=?,A.STR_CON_REPORT_YEAR=?,A.STR_SUBMIT_TO_EMP_NO=?,A.STR_INT_EMP_NO=?,A.NUM_INT_DESIG_ID=?, A.GNUM_ISVALID=?,A.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,A.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=? WHERE A.STR_ACR_PERIOD=? and A.STR_EMP_OFF_ATTRI_CODE=? and A.STR_ESTB_SEC_ID=? and A.STR_EMP_NO=? and A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PIST_ACR_GRP_B_DTL A SET A.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE A.STR_EMP_NUMBER=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
